commit message: Added info about OUYA to changelog
Implemented map moving for touch in workshop
fill map in workshop from the center
Fixed too small cost grid for AI
Implemented dead zone detection for workshop gui
Updated version name in main menu
Added default camera zoom to engine settings
fix for roads on bridges and edges of the map
Nerfed 'Airport Pt.2' map, increased unit view range
Fixed workshop/game hud mixing, renamed custom maps
Added a few fences to the campaign map
32 colour sprites + waves + no more ap label
Add control+z as undo in workshop
Removed need for control modifier for undo
Add apropriate button to stats screen for campaign/skirmish/workshop
Sprites cleanup part1 and blueprint terrain tileset
Move sounds loading to script for easier management
workshop with new sprites + dirt terrain
Moved tileset consts to a separate file
Added no enough AP in building shop
Add proper tileset to main map
Allow for placement of already owned buildings
Updated custom maps with new tilemap
Modify map migration to not break on missing map files
Modified built-in custom maps to be created with new file extension
Allow for placement of damaged buildings
Cleaned up build configs, added linux 32-bit export config
buildings ground + fence sprite fix + spawn fix
Prevented workshop dead zone crash on touch screen laptop
Split AI calculations between processing loops to smooth out the game
Prevent AI from performing action before camera shows it
Prevent AI on locking when no units available, updated build scripts
Prevent echo on going to menu using ESC key
Fix cinematic bars visible on stats screen
